thesaurus.dc:description: Vocabulary to represent an agent's role within the context of the specific action
thesaurus.dc:title: AgentActions role vocabulary

thesaurus: <concept dc:identifier="major-effort" dc:URI="http://purl.org/spar/scoro/major-effort dc:relation="http://purl.org/spar/scoro/major-effort" dc:description="Primary agent associated with the subject. In the case of a list of collectors, this is the primary collector role.">
